title: Brecon Beacons National Park
name: Beili Helyg Guest House
directions: From Penderyn, follow Cwm Cadlan road from Lamb Hotel for 1.5 miles, you'll see sign and yellow grit bin at the gate on your left.
content: Fantastic little B&B with 3 rooms, all en-suite. Very comfortable beds, friendly hosts, delicious breakfasts. Ideally placed for waterfalls and mountains, Walkers and cyclists welcome.

title: Eleuthera
name: Valentines Resort & Marina
content: Valentines is the most vibrant and exciting luxury resort in Harbour Island, Bahamas.  The resort offers 40 spacious, tropically appointed luxury suites with fully equipped kitchens and a 50 slip state of the art Yacht Marina.

title: Puerto Iguazú
name: Poramba Hostel
content: Small, friendly and relaxed hostel, offering both shared and private rooms. In a very nice, tranquil and green part of town, only 300mts. from the bus terminal. Good kitchen. Swimming pool.

title: Lappeenranta
name: Matkustajakoti Turisti-Lappee
content: Centrally located. The shower facilities are shared, the double rooms have private toilets but the single rooms do not. Prices include breakfast and the use of the sauna facilities.

title: Labuan
name: Pulau Labuan Hotel
content: a 2-star hotel. Rooms with A/C, attached toilet and wifi. Breakfast included.

title: Lesotho
name: Maliba Mountain Lodge
content: New 5 star luxury lodge situated in the [[Ts'ehlanyane National Park]]. Luxury suites, excellent food and a location like no other.  Hiking and pony-trekking available.

title: Zierikzee
name: Hotel Lotus
content: The hotel rooms are above a Chinese restaurant. All rooms have views on the port.

title: Zruč nad Sázavou
name: Penzion pod Zámkem
content: Offers nice rooms under the castle near the old town centre. You can also enjoy a café in this pension.

title: Semmering
name: Panhans Hotel
content: Is a historic 4 stars hotel in the centre, which opened in 1888 and got enlarged since. For the restaurant of the hotel see above.
